text: Lmumnin, siwa wid iumnen s Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma llan yides $ef lameo iten icerken, ur poueun alamma ssutren as tsrie. Ih, wid i k issuturen tsrie, d nitni i iumnen s Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma ssutren ak tsrie, $ef kra iten iaanan, serree i win i k ihwan, segsen. Ssuter i Oebbi ad sen Isemmee. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
